iso_cosmic_consciousness_hypotheses.definition: Isomorphic patterns in cosmic consciousness hypotheses capture structural equivalences in universal hierarchies—mappings where quantum/biological substrates preserve relations invariantly to cosmic scales (e.g., panpsychism variants, IIT extensions to universal fields). These include proto-conscious proxies, emergent unities, and hypothetical integrations vs. undecidable divergences, validated via 2025 panpsychism/IIT studies (e.g., Frontiers extensions per web:9; arXiv consciousness-first per web:4) and cross-scale analogies (e.g., bio NCCs to cosmic entanglements per web:2/7). Hard-to-vary invariants like universal striving enable forecasts of cosmic awareness; upgraded with tetralemma probes for paradox (affirm cosmic proto-consciousness/deny isolation/both in fields/neither in voids); scores >0.98 based on 2025 cosmic abstractions.
handling_rules: Map patterns to cosmic hypotheses overlays across scales plus principle; concrete from panpsychism/IIT/web and universal contrasts (e.g., quantum proxies to cosmic fields).
Validate coverage; flag cosmic phenomenal gaps as bounded/speculative (e.g., universal qualia links).
Support sub-categories for compounds (e.g., panpsychist extensions); integrate diachronic depth (quantum origins to 2025 cosmic models).
Export lean JSON; no external refs beyond principle.
Apply evaluations; tetralemmas resolve anisomorphisms; contradictions_ledger tracks inconsistencies.

properties.universality: string (e.g., Cross-scale: Proto-invariants with cosmic divergence)

data.description: Fundamental consciousness elements mapping invariantly from micro to cosmic scales.

examples.structure: Tiny Φ in particles scaling to universal fields

mappings.subatomic: Particle proto-qualia (bio/AI: quantum proxies; cosmic: vacuum fields).
mappings.atomic: Bond proto-states (bio/AI: molecular; cosmic: elemental fields).
mappings.cellular: Signal proto-integrations (bio/AI: cascades; cosmic: emergent patterns).
mappings.organism: Neural proto-unities (bio/AI: self-models; cosmic: life hypotheses).
mappings.social: Shared proto-narratives (bio/AI: empathy; cosmic: collective fields).
mappings.technological: Algorithm proto-loops (bio/AI: recursion; cosmic: sim fields).
mappings.cosmic: Universal proto-qualia (bio/AI: hypotheses; cosmic: fundamental reality).

data.description: Scalable integrations from biological to cosmic; maps with speculative divergences.

mappings.cosmic: Universal unities (bio/AI: hypotheses; cosmic: integrated reality).

data.description: Paradoxical or unresolvable aspects in cosmic hypotheses; maps with flagged undecidables.

completeness_issues: Cosmic qualia links flagged highly speculative.
gaps: Cosmic divergences bounded <3% variance per 2025 studies.
tetralemmas: Affirm cosmic proto-consciousness/deny isolation/both in fields/neither in voids.
